text: Trump says it's ‘very unlikely’ he'd pardon himself if elected  —  In an interview with NBC's “Meet the Press,” former President Donald Trump said that in his final days in office, he told people, “The last thing I'd ever do is give myself a pardon.”  —  Trump: ‘I could have had a pardon’ before leaving office
